interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: &&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
Review Date: 2019/07/08
Store: YRMJK
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Soft', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 3.1 x 2.7 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738426030676', 'Manufacturer': 'MUTTUS'}
Review Text: This set has everything you need for an electric toothbrush. In total it includes 6 brush heads (in the photo, one was still in the box), a charger, a case to hold the toothbrush and two brush heads for traveling, and the toothbrush itself with 5 distinct modes. Really you can think of it as having 15 modes because each mode can be on high, medium, or low intensity. The instruction manual describes each of the modes - they vary in rhythm and power. I used one of the weaker settings as the manual suggested because this is my first time using an electric toothbrush, which was the perfect amount of power for me! Have to mention that when this touches your lips by accident it tickles like I have never been tickled before, but I think that is to be expected from any electric toothbrush and just takes some getting used to. Overall, 5 stars - the color is also super cute, and you can't beat the very sturdy travel case! Just wish it had a compartment for the charger. Also impressed with its ability to hold a charge!
Review Title: Great toothbrush set!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories
LKE
{'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'}
This is the first UV/LED gel nail polish lamp I've ever tried, but it's been amazing so far! It seems pretty standard, it has options for timing from 10 seconds to 120. The best thing about it is that you can set the setting, and it will remember the setting and turn on when you put your hand in via motion sensors! That's super convenient when you have one or both hands covered in wet polish! It plugs into the wall and has a cord that I've found to definitely be long enough, and it's great that you don't have to rely on batteries for it. 5 stars!
Works great!
&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
YRMJK
{'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Soft', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 3.1 x 2.7 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738426030676', 'Manufacturer': 'MUTTUS'}
This set has everything you need for an electric toothbrush. In total it includes 6 brush heads (in the photo, one was still in the box), a charger, a case to hold the toothbrush and two brush heads for traveling, and the toothbrush itself with 5 distinct modes. Really you can think of it as having 15 modes because each mode can be on high, medium, or low intensity. The instruction manual describes each of the modes - they vary in rhythm and power. I used one of the weaker settings as the manual suggested because this is my first time using an electric toothbrush, which was the perfect amount of power for me! Have to mention that when this touches your lips by accident it tickles like I have never been tickled before, but I think that is to be expected from any electric toothbrush and just takes some getting used to. Overall, 5 stars - the color is also super cute, and you can't beat the very sturdy travel case! Just wish it had a compartment for the charger. Also impressed with its ability to hold a charge!
Great toothbrush set!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for cosmetic tools related to eye makeup and is expanding their interest into nail care products, specifically UV/LED curing lamps, alongside personal care gadgets like electric toothbrushes.
- **Quality and Functionality:** The user values high-performing products that meet expectations, showcasing satisfaction with functionality and convenience. Their recent feedback indicates a continued appreciation for effective tools across different beauty and personal care categories.
- **Supplemental Features:** They appreciate accessories and features that enhance usability, including programmable settings and multiple modes in electric devices, demonstrating a consistent interest in products that offer versatility.
- **Simplicity in Use:** The user prefers user-friendly, straightforward manual tools but is increasingly open to technologically advanced products that simplify processes, such as those offering multiple modes and battery-powered convenience.
- **Aesthetic Appeal:** The user appreciates stylish designs in beauty and personal care products, as highlighted by their positive remarks about product aesthetics and overall presentation.

Overall, the user exhibits a willingness to explore both beauty and personal care categories while emphasizing quality, functionality, and ease of use, with an openness to technology that enhances convenience. Their recent interactions indicate a balanced interest in aesthetics and performance across a broader range of products.
